page.title: 12Education In Our Area(cont.)
page.content: The County Farm is an educational farm which accepts visits from school children.Animals at the farm range from hens to bulls.Children and adults are fascinated by such things as bee hives and baby animals.Often they have an open day where a tractor ride is just one of the many things you can see or do.Both child & adult have great fun at the farm and agree it's a great way to learn.It helps children a lot with their education. The County Farm also breeds their own animals.They have hens,cows,sheep, lambs,a bull,various cows & birds, and the collection still grows.You can also milk the cows which for children is quite a thrill.They can see the sheep being sheeared.There is also a training centre for students wanting to be farmers.
